import AddComment from './AddComment' const Comment = ({singleComment, activeComment, toggleCommentForm, setCommentsContent, commentsContent}) => { const isActive = singleComment.id === activeComment const activate = () => { toggleCommentForm(singleComment.id) } const updateScore = (e) => { let val = e.currentTarget.value console.log(val) let score = commentsContent.find(comment => comment.id === singleComment.id) score.score = val === 'plus'? score.score += 1 : score.score -+ 1 score.score = 100 setCommentsContent(commentsContent) } return (
{singleComment.score}
{singleComment.user.username} {singleComment.createdAt}
Reply

{singleComment.content}

{isActive && }
{singleComment.replies && singleComment.replies.map(singleComment => )}
) } export default Comment;
